overview.summary: Texture Builder for use with Volume/SlicerVisualizer.

description.p: The UTextureBuilder inherits from the TextureBuilder . The module is used to create 3D volume textures for use by the and modules. The two inputs are a scalar LatVolField and an optional vector LatVolField that are packed into an appropriate texture. Both fields must have the same dimensionality. The Gradient Field input port is used for lighting and ColorMap2 filtering and is only required if those two features are to be used. It can be computed from the scalar field using the module if needed. See also the module.
